entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
